com.assignment2.dos.smarterHomes

Class GatewayManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.assignment2.dos.smarterHomes.GatewayManager

  • public class GatewayManager
extends java.lang.Object
    GatewayManager (stateful server) handles the complete functionality of the Gateway. It's a stateful server and communicates with the devices controllers and the sensors.
